text.description:
Paris food vlog! What I ate over a week in Paris.
Where I get my music: https://www.epidemicsound.com/
MY SOCIAL LINKS: ➡️INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/annawildman/ ➡️BLOG: https://annawildman.blog ➡️PODCAST: https://goo.gl/aiWyJ2
text.fulltitle: VEGAN IN PARIS | best vegan eats
text.title: VEGAN IN PARIS | best vegan eats
